description: Gets a list of locales for the specified bot.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot to list locales for.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot to list locales for.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Specifies sorting parameters for the list of locales. You can sort by locale name in ascending or descending order. The bot locale attribute to sort by. Specifies whether to sort the bot locales in ascending or descending order.

nested_params.name: attribute
nested_params.description: The bot locale attribute to sort by.

nested_params.name: order
nested_params.description: Specifies whether to sort the bot locales in ascending or descending order.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Provides the specification for a filter used to limit the response to only those locales that match the filter specification. You can only specify one filter and one value to filter on. (dict) --- Filters responses returned by the ListBotLocales operation. The name of the field to filter the list of bots. The value to use for filtering the list of bots. (string) --- The operator to use for the filter. Specify EQ when the ListBotLocales operation should return only aliases that equal the specified value. Specify CO when the ListBotLocales operation should return aliases that contain the specified value.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the field to filter the list of bots.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The value to use for filtering the list of bots.

nested_params.name: operator
nested_params.description: The operator to use for the filter. Specify EQ when the ListBotLocales operation should return only aliases that equal the specified value. Specify CO when the ListBotLocales operation should return aliases that contain the specified value.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot to list locales for.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates whether there are more results to return in a response to the ListBotLocales operation. If the nextToken field is present, you send the contents as the nextToken parameter of a ListBotLocales operation request to get the next page of results.

nested_items.name: botLocaleSummaries
nested_items.description: Summary information for the locales that meet the filter criteria specified in the request. The length of the list is specified in the maxResults parameter of the request. If there are more locales available, the nextToken field contains a token to get the next page of results.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The language and locale of the bot locale.

nested_items.name: localeName
nested_items.description: The name of the bot locale.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the bot locale.

nested_items.name: botLocaleStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the bot locale. When the status is Built the locale is ready for use.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp of the date and time that the bot locale was last updated.

nested_items.name: lastBuildSubmittedDateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp of the date and time that the bot locale was last built.
